TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
Spread.Views supports serialization of all grid options, layout engine options and column definitions to a JSON object using toJSON function. This JSON object can be used to create a grid.

Sample Code

The following is the code for creating a grid:

Javascript JS var grid2 = new GcSpread.Grid.GcGrid(container, data, grid1.toJSON());
If the grids are not in the same page or frame then all the reference css files should be added manually for every page.
